caption: A hard-hitting metal anthem with crushing distorted guitars, double bass drumming, and aggressive male vocals alternating between screams and melodic singing. Features technical guitar riffs, breakdown sections, and an epic orchestral bridge.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Rising from the ashes of a broken world
Battlefield of chaos flags unfurled
They tried to silence us but we won't break
This is our moment everything's at stake

[Pre-Chorus]
We are the ones they fear
Our time is finally here

[Chorus]
Unbreakable! We stand as one!
Unbreakable! Until it's done!
Through fire and pain we will remain
Unbreakable!

[Verse 2]
Scars of war upon our skin
Every loss fuels the fire within
No surrender no retreat
Victory or defeat

[Pre-Chorus]
We are the ones they fear
Our time is finally here

[Chorus]
Unbreakable! We stand as one!
Unbreakable! Until it's done!
Through fire and pain we will remain
Unbreakable!

[Breakdown]

Fight! Fight! Fight!
We will never fall!

[Bridge]

From the darkness we emerge
On the edge of the world

[Final Chorus]
Unbreakable! We stand as one!
Unbreakable! Until it's done!
Unbreakable!

[Outro]
